posts.post_content:
For sale are 41 SGC graded T206 cards.  All prices include shipping, handling and insurance.  PayPal and other forms of payment accepted. 

Please address all inquiries to my email address - [url]dmjt913@epbfi.com[/url]

Thanks, as always, for your interest.

Dave

SHIPPING NOTICE:  All cards that were reserved and paid for on Friday and before 11:00 today (Saturday) have been shipped.

Thanks,
Dave

All cards reserved and paid for on Friday and before 11:00 this morning (Saturday) have been shipped.

Thanks,
Dave
